Melee Weapon Attack:
 +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7
(2d6) acid damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty
to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent
and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze
is destroyed after dealing damage.
While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

name: Gray Ooze
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8
